name: kf-sass
license: BUY MILES A BEER LICENSE - see LICENSE file

scripts.generate_singlefile_dist: echo "// Kf - Sass animation library (v.$npm_package_version)" | cat - LICENSE > dist/kf-$npm_package_version.scss; cat scss/kf.scss | sed 's/@import//g' | tr -d ';' | xargs -If cat scss/f.scss >> dist/kf-$npm_package_version.scss
scripts.lint: find . -type f -name '*.scss' | grep -v node_modules | xargs -I file sed -i 's/ *$//' file
